## GAD-7 vs PAS

for Efficient Comparison In the current landscape of psychological research, comparing the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Pandemic Anxiety Scale (PAS) can be a task of considerable complexity. These two measures, crucial for understanding our psychological responses, have diverse items that address different facets of anxiety and personal wellbeing. However, the software Harmony can simplify the process of comparing GAD-7 vs PAS. Its use of natural language processing and generative AI models enables researchers to conveniently harmonise questionnaire items, thus transforming a time-consuming process into a streamlined one. Harmony has a deep-seated advantage in its operation: it provides a percentage match between each item in the GAD-7 and PAS. Furthermore, Harmony's database allows researchers to upload their own instruments in PDF form, thereby broadening the scope of possible comparisons extensively. Indeed, in addressing 'GAD-7 vs PAS' directly, one illustrates a research landscape that is consistently evolving, with its tools adapting swiftly to keep pace. Harmony is capable of comparing items in multiple languages, further expanding its usability across global research studies. Its ability to automate the process of comparing GAD-7 vs PAS, or any other psychology instruments, saves invaluable time and resources, thus allowing researchers to focus on interpreting the data rather than spending countless hours in preparation work. By providing a much-needed structure to the process of questionnaire harmonisation, Harmony is revolutionising the field of psychology research.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and PAS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and PAS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PAS into Harmony</a> - compare PAS with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
